Author: GirlWearingMyDress
Text: I’m a nurse and I feed my patients all the time. I’ve realized that most of the time when they get to me they’ve had nothing to eat for 12+ hours for no reason other than transfer of care and no one thinking to feed them.    Feeding normal people when they’re in the midst of an unexpected medical event is very effective in building good therapeutic relationships.

Author: so_crat_ic
Text: it's like the cultural thing when you go out with friends. everyone HAS TO EAT or have a meal. during the social event. why can't we just play chess? lol.
